mapper.select: SELECT usm.user_shop_id, usm.create_time, usm.point, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, buyer.user_id, buyer.name FROM tb_user_shop_map usm, tb_shop s, tb_person_info buyer WHERE usm.shop_id = s.shop_id AND usm.user_id = buyer.user_id AND usm.user_id = #{userShopCondition.user.userId} AND usm.shop_id = #{userShopCondition.shop.shopId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_shop_map(user_id, shop_id, create_time, point) VALUES (#{user.userId},#{shop.shopId},#{createTime},#{point})
